title: Second day of Ukraine-Russia peace talks in UAE end without breakthrough
description: Prisoner exchange agreed at most significant contact between Kyiv and Moscow in months, but ‘work remains’
content:
Ukraine and Russia concluded a second day of US-led talks in Abu Dhabi on Thursday without a breakthrough towards ending Europe’s most deadly conflict since the second world war.
The two sides agreed to a reciprocal exchange of 157 prisoners of war e... [3094 chars]

title: Trump signals US support for Chagos handover deal
description: It comes after the US president suggested last month he could withdraw his support for the deal.
content:
Donald Trump has signalled that he now supports the UK's Chagos Islands handover deal to Mauritius, after launching a scathing attack on the agreement two weeks ago.
The US president had labelled the deal an "act of great stupidity," prompting fears ... [3059 chars]

title: Restoring Palace of Westminster could cost £40bn and take 61 years
description: Home of UK parliament spends £1.5m a week on repairs but critics say restoration proposals lack accountability
content:
Plans to restore the crumbling Palace of Westminster could cost £40bn and take up to 61 years, a report by the body set up to investigate how the project should be handled has found.
Critics labelled the cost as “eye-watering” and said the project la... [2815 chars]

title: 15-year-old boy arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after teacher attacked, police say
description: Officers said they responded to a report that a teacher had been assaulted by a pupil. They said the teacher was injured, but it was not a stab injury.
content:
A 15-year-old boy has been arrested on suspicion of attempted murder after a teacher was attacked, police have said.
The assault happened at a school in Milford Haven, Pembrokeshire, Dyfed-Powys Police said.
Officers said they responded to a report o... [1500 chars]

title: Man arrested after e-biker killed in horse and cart crash
description: A man is arrested on suspicion of wanton and furious driving after a cyclist was killed in Chingford.
content:
A man has been arrested on suspicion of wanton and furious driving after a cyclist was killed in a crash with a horse and cart in east London.
The incident took place at about 18:10 GMT on Wednesday on Folly Lane in Chingford. The e-bike rider, a man... [400 chars]
